John Reynolds

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Aloy Hauck
  3. Foster Family Alt: Hanck
  4. Location of Family: Platte County, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Columbus, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 17
  8. Date of Birth: Unknown
  9. Gender: male
  10. Notes: "To receive wages"
  11. Source: Columbus Telegram, 28 April 1898.
